attributes.name: windDrivenRatio
attributes.description: Ratio of wind driven sea to the total sea.

attributes.name: windPeakPeriod
attributes.description: Peak period of the wind driven sea

attributes.name: swellPeakPeriod
attributes.description: Peak period of the swell sea

attributes.name: gammaWind
attributes.description: Gamma parameter for wind driven sea

attributes.name: upperSlopeWind
attributes.description: Slope of the upper frequency part of the wind driven part of wave spectrum

attributes.name: lowerSlopeWind
attributes.description: Slope of the lower frequency part of the wind driven part of wave spectrum

attributes.name: upperSlopeSwell
attributes.description: Slope of the upper frequency part of the swell part of wave spectrum

attributes.name: lowerSlopeSwell
attributes.description: Slope of the lower frequency part of the swell part of wave spectrum
